detail_desc: Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Wide, straight-cut jacket in a viscose weave with a sheen. Notch lapels, a concealed fastening at the front, front pockets, dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.

Longer, straight-cut jacket in wide wale corduroy with notch lapels and partially concealed buttons at the front and cuffs. Welt front pockets, an inner pocket with a button and a single back vent. Lined.
Blouse in crinkled plumeti viscose with lace details. V-neck, an open front with ties at the bottom, 3/4-length sleeves and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend with a hood, V-neck, diagonal zip down the front and side pockets. Decorative seams down the hood, back and sides.
Elastic hairband with an appliqué at the front and elastication at the back.
Elastic hairband with an appliqué at the front and elastication at the back.

Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, diagonal zip at the top, long raglan sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Socks in textured-knit cotton with rib-knit, fold-down shafts.
Socks in textured-knit cotton with rib-knit, fold-down shafts.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, chest pocket with a print motif and appliqués, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Patterned joggers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved dress in a fine knit containing glittery threads with a round neckline and sewn-on bow at the top.
Braided imitation leather waist belt with elastic at the back and a metal clasp at the front. Width approx. 6 cm.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a decorative knot detail at the front and elastic with a metal fastener at the back. Width approx. 4 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves with frills at the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves with frills at the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Chelsea boots in leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Twill linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Ankle-length jeans in sturdy denim with a high waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal front pockets, back pockets and straight legs with twisted seams that taper to the hems.
Fancy dress costume in glossy jersey with a V-neck, zip at the back and button at the back of the neck. Large shoulder pads, elastication at the waist and short legs.
Fitted jumpsuit in patterned velour with a V-neck front and back and a faux fur-trimmed tail. Unlined.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with a lace yoke at the top and a frill trim at the neckline and shoulders. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with elastication and frill trims. Concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a lace stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Two flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders, an elasticated seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.

Short dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front. 3/4-length sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and scalloped trim around the neckline, sleeve-ends and hem. Partly lined.

Short dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front. 3/4-length sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and scalloped trim around the neckline, sleeve-ends and hem. Partly lined.

Short dress in printed jersey with short sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.
Short dress in printed jersey with short sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon with flounces. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline, long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Partly lined.

Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with ties at the neck and a yoke and long sleeves in lace. Flounce at the top that continues to the back of the dress, a concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Twill jacket with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and side pockets. Adjustable tabs and buttons at the sides and buttoned cuffs.
Short-sleeved shirt in washed denim with a button-down collar and classic front. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, yoke at the back, chest pocket and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a padded top edge, wide elastic at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Top in jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a round neck and long sleeves with a gathered seam and flounce at the cuffs.
